Description: The measurement system should (S5) record all power outages (in 1-, 2- or 3-phases) in a measurement unit that is longer than 3 minutes.
The fields in HES (S130) should be dynamic and adapted to the information that will be displayed to the user (linked to requirement S131).
For example, if the field can contain 18 positions with digits, then (S131) all digits should be visible to the User (no hidden parts).

Feature: Filtering and sorting in the alarm list
Description: A user should (B73) have the ability to filter and sort the alarm list.
